text: Ecevit is a Turkish surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Bülent Ecevit (1925–2006), Turkish politician, poet, writer and journalist * Nazlı Ecevit (1900–1985), Turkish female painter and mother of Bülent Ecevit * Rahşan Ecevit (1923–2020), spouse of the late Turkish politician and former prime minister Bülent Ecevit Category:Turkish-language surnames
title: Ecevit
